page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: We often see the past as irrelevent & gone but truth reveals that it's really very much with us today.In this {Domesday Project,}we have learned that in analysing our surroundings,our origins give us a great insight into the development of the town. {Cookstown}is an attractive area of undulating hills. The main street extends northwords for{1.5 miles stretching towards the magnificent massive{Slieve Gallion}mountain. Our study has been confined to the southern half of the town. As our study began it was easy to overlook examples of archaelogical remains, but there are many examples of{forts, {raths,}famous giant graves, &{the {burial mounds}of the bronze age people. This area also houses the famous{inauguration throne of the {O'Neill Clan.}Today many of the modern
